data.name: 【VR】Ejaculation Supporter / 射精サポーター
data.detailed_description:
◇【Handtracking】: Touch the character with your own hands! No controller needed!

◆【Ejaculation Support】: In insertion, blow job and hand job mode, the girl moves following your hand! High practicality is realized!

◇【Grabbing hands and feet】: You can freely change the direction of wrists and ankles, elbows and knees! Put the girl in your favorite position!

◆【High operability】: Intuitive operation by eliminating buttons that are difficult to handle by hand tracking!

◇【Improved boob texture】: Realized more realistic boob movement than conventional Dynamic Bone by completely different physics calculation.

◆【Sperm Texture】：Improved the sticky feeling of sperm at the time of bukkake! Also, continuous ejaculation is possible!

◇【Kissing】: When you kiss the character, the player's face will follow. Tilt your head to recreate a deep kiss!

◆【Pass-through】: Your room becomes the background! Experience sex in a familiar room!

* This product is exclusively for Meta Quest2 (Oculus Quest2).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
